name: DavideBlade
body:
## My plugins
Plugin | Description
------------ | -------------
[Health](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/99340/) | Health is a plugin for care, feeds and sets hearts and cutlets to players.
[FullCloak](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/98851/) | FullCloak is a plugin for hide players when crouching.
[Clash of Minecrafters](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/31180/) | The first Clash of Clans plugin!
[LobbyOptions](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/lobbyoptions.24730/) | Make more beautiful your lobby with various options!
[AntiWorldDownloader](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/99356/) | Prevent stealing of your maps!
[HealthBar-Reloaded](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/104616/) | Cool health bars above mobs' and players' heads, a must-have for RPG and PvP servers!
[LecternDisplay](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/117687/) | Display of entities, items, entire buildings, and real-time world areas!

## Hire me
You need configuration for your server? You need a custom plugin? Contact me!

## Contacts
- Spigot: **[DavideBlade](https://www.spigotmc.org/members/davideblade.75975/)**.
- Discord: **[DavideBlade#9784]**.
